trans-unit.source: Below is a complete list of the functions available in AutoIt. Click on a function name for a detailed description.

seg-source.mrk: GUICtrlRegisterListViewSort

target.mrk: GUICtrlRegisterListViewSort

trans-unit.source: Register a user defined function for an internal listview sorting callback function.

target.mrk: Register a user defined function for an internal listview sorting callback function.

seg-source.mrk: GUICtrlSetBkColor

target.mrk: GUICtrlSetBkColor

seg-source.mrk: GUICtrlSetDefBkColor

target.mrk: GUICtrlSetDefBkColor
